attributes.action: Appear on Quesion Time for a 3 hour September 11 and London 7/7 special edition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is a significant percentage of the populace who have looked at all the evidence and can see cleary that 911 was carried out by elements of the US goverment and the same appears to be true for 7/7. Experts such as David Ray Griffin and Stephen E Jones have shown the official storys to be lies and propaganda. Ex Mi5 David Shaler has been very vocal on the subject. I petition the prime minister to appear on QT for 3 hours with Griffin, Jones and Shaler to answer questions.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
